Title: Ball in Hand
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Brian Koppelman, David Levien, Adam R. Perlman, Alice O'Neill (staff writer)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Axe receives unexpected news; Chuck finalizes his long game. Season finale.
